entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Rogersville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 8 except plus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8 except plus 4 along parts of the coast. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
